mapper.select: select hol.oli_no, hol.m_no, hol.payment, hol.payment_date, oli.oli_no, oli.title, oli.img_path, oli.price from history_order_lecture hol, online_lecture_introduction oli where hol.m_no = #{m_no} and hol.oli_no = oli.oli_no group by hol.oli_no order by hol.payment_date desc

select oli.oli_no, oli.title, oli.img_path, oli.price, oll.reg_date from online_lecture_introduction oli, online_lecture_like oll where oll.m_no = #{m_no} and oll.oli_no = oli.oli_no group by oll.oli_no order by oll.reg_date desc

select hol.oli_no, hol.m_no, hol.payment, hol.payment_date, oli.oli_no, oli.title, oli.img_path, oli.price, TRUNCATE((SELECT AVG(star_rating) FROM online_lecture_reply olr WHERE olr.oli_no = oli.oli_no),0) star_avg from history_order_lecture hol, online_lecture_introduction oli where hol.m_no = #{m_no} and hol.oli_no = oli.oli_no and oli.title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') group by hol.oli_no order by hol.payment_date desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO history_order_lecture(oli_no, m_no, payment, payment_status) VALUES(#{oli_no}, #{m_no}, #{payment}, #{payment_status})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM history_order_lecture WHERE oli_no = #{oli_no} AND m_no = #{m_no}

select hon.hon_no, hon.n_no, hon.m_no, hon.payment, hon.payment_date, n.m_no, n.title, TRUNCATE((SELECT AVG(star_rating) FROM note_reply nr WHERE nr.n_no = n.n_no),0) star_avg, (SELECT m.m_name FROM member m WHERE n.m_no = m.m_no) m_name from history_order_note hon, note n, member m where hon.m_no = #{m_no} and hon.n_no = n.n_no group by hon.hon_no order by hon.payment_date desc
select n.n_no, n.m_no, n.title, nl.n_no, nl.m_no, nl.reg_date from note n, note_like nl where nl.m_no = #{m_no} and n.n_no = nl.n_no group by n.n_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO history_order_note(n_no, m_no, payment, payment_status) VALUES(#{n_no}, #{m_no}, #{payment}, #{payment_status})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM history_order_note WHERE n_no = #{n_no} AND m_no = #{m_no}
